What is Layering?

Instead of entering a trade all at once, layering spreads your entries across a defined zone. It leads to a more favorable average price, reduced drawdowns, and better risk control during price fluctuations.
Best traders do it on big accounts, but it can also work for you.

Why Layoo exists?

Layering is a powerful trading approach ‚Äî until execution becomes complex. Managing multiple entries, stops and take-profits manually increases stress, execution time and error risk. Layoo removes this operational friction by letting you manage all layers as one coherent trade.

Who Is Layoo For?

Layering Traders

Traders who already use (or want to use) layered entries instead of single entries, and want a clearer and more structured way to manage them.

Risk-Focused Traders

Traders who want to know before entering a trade how much they risk and what they can realistically gain, based on their entry strategy.

Prepared Traders

Layoo does not promise results and does not replace a trading strategy. ‚Äî it helps you execute your plan more efficiently.
